value.title: Create an Azure Database for PostgreSQL server
value.excerpt: Azure Database for PostgreSQL provides fully managed, enterprise-ready community PostgreSQL database as a service. Learn how to create and deploy this service and connect it to your applications.

images.title: Create an Azure Database for PostgreSQL server

value.title: Create security baselines
value.excerpt: Create security baselines

images.title: Create security baselines

value.title: Identify the tasks of a data engineer in a cloud-hosted architecture
value.excerpt: Learn about the responsibilities of a data engineer. Find out how they relate to the jobs of other data and AI professionals. Explore common data engineering practices and a high-level architecting process for a data-engineering project.

images.title: Identify the tasks of a data engineer in a cloud-hosted architecture

value.title: Design a hybrid network architecture on Azure
value.excerpt: You have a traditional on-premises infrastructure that you need to connect to resources in Azure. In this module, you learn how to select a connectivity method for your use cases that balances functionality, cost, and security.

images.title: Design a hybrid network architecture on Azure

value.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure
value.excerpt: Use monitoring services on Azure to bring operational excellence to your applications and infrastructure.

images.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure

value.title: Detect and analyze faces with the Face service
value.excerpt: Face detection, analysis, and recognition is an important capability for artificial intelligence (AI) solutions. The Face cognitive service in Azure makes it easy integrate these capabilities into your applications.

images.title: Detect and analyze faces with the Face service

value.title: Centralize your core services by using hub and spoke Azure virtual network architecture
value.excerpt: Design a network architecture in Azure that allows for growth and flexibility, secure isolation of critical resources, low administrative overhead, and communication with on-premises network resources.

images.title: Centralize your core services by using hub and spoke Azure virtual network architecture

value.title: Implement message-based communication workflows with Azure Service Bus
value.excerpt: Write C# code in a custom application that sends and receives messages using Azure Service Bus topics and queues.

images.title: Implement message-based communication workflows with Azure Service Bus

value.title: Introduction to Kubernetes
value.excerpt: Determine the types of business problems that can be solved using Kubernetes. Describe the benefits of container orchestration with features like deployment management, automatic updates, and self-healing.

images.title: Introduction to Kubernetes

value.title: Publish a web app to Azure with Visual Studio
value.excerpt: Use the publishing features of Visual Studio 2017 to deploy and manage an ASP.NET Core web application hosted on Azure.

images.title: Publish a web app to Azure with Visual Studio

value.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks
value.excerpt: Use Azure Disk Encryption (ADE) to encrypt OS and data disks on existing and new VMs.

images.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks

value.title: Evaluate text with Azure Cognitive Language Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Cognitive Language Services to analyze text, determine intent, detect adult themes, and process natural language input.

topItems.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to implement text moderation with the Azure Content Moderator service.

images.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator

topItems.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
topItems.excerpt: Introduction to adding conversational intelligence to your apps by using language understanding (LUIS)

images.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)

topItems.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
topItems.excerpt: Learn what your customers are really saying about your product or brand when they send feedback. We'll create a solution that uses Azure Functions and the intelligence of the Text Analytics API to discover sentiment in text messages.

images.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator

value.title: Introduction to AI technology for business leaders
value.excerpt: In this learning path, you will be provided with a high-level overview of the primary concepts of AI. You will be able to describe what AI happens to be and the technologies that underpin it. You will be able to share  how Microsoft is turning the latest advancements in AI into tools, products, and services that can be leveraged by organizations.

topItems.title: Introduction to AI technology
topItems.excerpt: This module provides a high-level overview of the primary concepts of AI and the technologies behind it. We then dive into how Microsoft is turning the latest advancements in AI into tools, products, and services that can be leveraged by organizations.

images.title: Introduction to AI technology

topItems.title: Examine the Microsoft approach to artificial intelligence
topItems.excerpt: This module is a starting point for business decision makers who want to understand how Microsoft is creating products, services, and solutions to help organizations leverage Artificial Intelligence (AI). Weâ€™ll also help you understand how these technologies relate to business problems.

images.title: Examine the Microsoft approach to artificial intelligence
Introduction to AI technology

value.title: Large-Scale Data Processing with Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2
value.excerpt: In this learning path, you will see how Azure Data Lake Storage can make processing Big Data analytical solutions more efficient and how easy it is to set up. You will also explore how it fits into common architectures, as well as the different methods of uploading the data to the data store. You will finally examine the myriad of security features that will ensure your data is secure.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Data Lake Storage provides a cloud storage service that is highly available, secure, durable, scalable, and redundant and brings new efficiencies to processing big data analytics workloads.

images.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage

topItems.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage
topItems.excerpt: Learn various ways to upload data to Data Lake Storage Gen 2. Upload data through the Azure portal, Azure Storage Explorer, or .NET. Or copy the data in Azure Data Factory.

images.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage

topItems.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data. Find out how to use access keys, to secure networks, and to use Advanced Threat Protection to proactively monitor your system.

images.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage

value.title: Process and classify images with the Azure Cognitive Vision Services
value.excerpt: Microsoft Cognitive Services offers pre-built functionality to enable computer vision functionality in your applications.  Learn how to use the Cognitive Vision Services to detect faces, tag and classify images, and identify objects.

topItems.title: Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the Computer Vision API in Azure that allows you to identify facial details in pictures.

images.title: Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services

topItems.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service
topItems.excerpt: Use the Computer Vision API to analyze images for insights, extract text from images, and generate high-quality thumbnails.

images.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service

topItems.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
topItems.excerpt: Create, train and test a custom image classification model using the Custom Vision Service to accurately identify paintings from famous artists.

images.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services

value.title: Analyze costs and create budgets with Azure Cost Management
value.excerpt: Learn how to use cost analysis to understand how your costs accrue each month. Use this understanding to create an Azure budget to monitor and alert on your costs.

images.title: Analyze costs and create budgets with Azure Cost Management

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence
value.excerpt: Learn how to design an Azure architecture that uses modern practices and gives you full visibility into what's happening in your environment.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency
value.excerpt: Scaling your system to handle load, identifying network bottlenecks, and optimizing your storage performance are important to ensure your users have the best experience. Learn how to make your application perform at its best.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency

value.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
value.excerpt: Learn what your customers are really saying about your product or brand when they send feedback. We'll create a solution that uses Azure Functions and the intelligence of the Text Analytics API to discover sentiment in text messages.

images.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API

value.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: Use the Computer Vision API to analyze images for insights, extract text from images, and generate high-quality thumbnails.

images.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service

value.title: Create your first Azure IoT Central app
value.excerpt: This module builds an IoT Central app to monitor and command a refrigerated truck. The first unit creates the app, the second unit defines a device template for a refrigerated truck. Then, create a programming project, add code to simulate a truck, and communicate with your IoT Central app. The truck is monitored through a custom dashboard.

images.title: Create your first Azure IoT Central app

value.title: Deploy a prebuilt module to the Edge device
value.excerpt: Deploy a pre-built temperature simulator module to the edge using a container. The pre-built module will be deployed to an IoT edge device. You will check that the module was successfully created and deployed to the edge. You will view the simulated data from the deployed module.

images.title: Deploy a prebuilt module to the Edge device

value.title: Distribute your data globally with Azure Cosmos DB
value.excerpt: Distribute your data globally with Azure Cosmos DB

images.title: Distribute your data globally with Azure Cosmos DB

value.title: Encrypt network traffic end to end with Azure Application Gateway
value.excerpt: Secure the traffic from your users all the way to your web servers by enabling TLS encryption on Application Gateway.

images.title: Encrypt network traffic end to end with Azure Application Gateway

value.title: Execute an Azure Function with triggers
value.excerpt: A trigger is responsible for executing an Azure function and there are dozens of triggers to choose from. This module will you show you some of the most common types of triggers and how to configure them to execute your logic.

images.title: Execute an Azure Function with triggers

value.title: Explore concepts of data analytics
value.excerpt: Learn how to ingest raw data into a data analytics system, and use this data to create analytical models that enable a business to gain meaningful insights into their operations.

images.title: Explore concepts of data analytics

value.title: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to provision and configure Azure SQL Database, Azure Database for PostgreSQL, and Azure Database for MySQL.

images.title: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure

value.excerpt: Learn about the Computer Vision API in Azure that allows you to identify facial details in pictures.

images.title: Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services
